name: rbsInstall
description: Install Rubrik Backup Service on a host.

body.description: Configuration parameters to install RBS on a host.

$ul: **endTime**: The end time of the request.
**message**: The error message for failed IDs.
**id**: The ID of the request object used to poll the status.
**nodeId**: The ID of the node where the job ran.
**progress**: The current percentage progress of the asynchronous request.
**startTime**: The start time of the request.
**agentId**: UUID that uniquely identifies the Rubrik Backup Service on the Rubrik cluster.
**agentVersion**: Version of the Rubrik Backup Service.
**name**: IP address or hostname of the host.
**osInfo**: Version of the operating system that the host is running.
**osType**: Type of the operating system that the host is running.
**status**: The status of the Rubrik Backup Service on the host.
